Class DAGraph

java.lang.Object
  abce.agency.util.graphs.DAGraph
All Implemented Interfaces:
Identifiable, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Pipeline
public class DAGraph
extends java.lang.Object
implements Identifiable, java.io.Serializable

Author:
ruppmatt DAGraph implements a Directed Acyclic (DA) graph using DANodes. It is an HNode, so it can plug into other Hierarchical data structures.
